remarks: A constant function expressed in terms of its functionality, domain, and value.  See also ~ fconst2 .  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 8-Jan-2019.)
statement:
fconstfvm $p |- ( E. y y e. A -> ( F : A --> { B } <-> ( F Fn A /\ A. x e. A ( F ` x ) = B ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d A y $.
$d B x $.
$d F x $.
